name: Bunny on a Plane
description:
You're a bunny, and you're on a plane.

The third entry of the Cozy Trilogy, Bunny on a plane, tasks you with controlling bunny with your mouse to shoot down balloons, fly through rings and do sick stunts for points!

Miss too many things and it's game over!

Mouse to move, Left click to fire, right click to do a stunt.

Enjoy singing along with the Karaoke mode!

Made solo for Ludum Dare 38.

https://ldjam.com/events/ludum-dare/38/bunny-on-a-plane
